guide.title: Outdated CPAN Packages (Ebuild vs CPAN)
guide.author: Script generated
guide.abstract: This document lists the packages suspected as outdated

body.p: This list is not exhaustive and may contain mistakes/errors. Accuracy is only guaranteed at 90% and is generated to inform developers about which CPAN modules are currently out of date in portage. Our most frequent bug request is for module bumping. This list is intended as acknowledgement (and hopefully will curb some of the bugs to boot).
